Description:
We arrive at an archaeological excavation behind the ancient Obelisk. It seems that something has happened, everyone in the place is nervous. A wizard in ostentatious robes comes up to us and says:

(Hanshek) "You are just in time! We have just been robbed of something very important. The stolen object is an ancient gem... after months of digging... when I finally got it...

The thieves were human and headed east of the forest, it is vital that you recover it for me.
DescriptionAction: I, Lord Hanshek, command you to retrieve the gem at any cost."

    "SSRewardText": "(Hanshek) \"I assume you are the captain of this platoon. I see you don't know who I am... well, at least you have manners. I am Lord Hanshek, court magician and advisor to the king.\n\nTherefore, as your superior, I order you to go immediately to retrieve the stolen gem. This order takes precedence over any other, and it is of vital importance that when you recover it you deliver it only to me and no one else.\"\n\n(Yogger) \"Captain, you should have asked for a reward... He's too interested in us returning it only to him, it seems a bit shady...\"",

    "SSRewardText": "(Hanshek) \"How insolent... unlike Queen Amelia, I would expect nothing less from werewolves... I am Lord Hanshek, court magician and advisor to the king.\n\nIf you don't want to be executed for treason, you'd better hurry up and retrieve the stolen gem. Also, be sure to deliver it only to me and no one else.\"\n\n(Magnus) \"Yes, sir! I regret my comrade's comment. On my honor we will see to it that the gem is recovered immediately.\"",
